statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, age, email FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, phone FROM customer_data WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customer_data ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE gender='Female' AND age > 30
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT customer_id, phone FROM customer_data WHERE preferences->>'Category' = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_history->>'Total Purchases' > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, item_name, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_level FROM preferences WHERE preference_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' OR first_name = 'Jane';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, product_price FROM purchases WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_level = 'High' AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, p.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_age_from <= 30 AND target_age_to >= 45;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.preference_category, p.preference_value FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, birth_date FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM preferences WHERE preference_value='High';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget >= 10000;
